name: Lotus Youth Preserve Line & Texture Smoothing Moisturizer
about: What it is: A lightweight antioxidant moisturizer that helps smooth texture & the look of fine lines while boosting hydration for radiant, youthful-looking skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Super Lotus: Smooths lines & helps to boost radiance.- Star Fruit Leaf Extract: Smooths while helping to reduce visible wrinkles- Vitamin E: Helps protect & soothe...What Else You Need to Know: This newly upgraded formula is clinically proven to smooth visible wrinkles and texture for supple, radiant skin that’s prepped for makeup. Ethically-sourced* Super Lotus and vitamin E protects skin, while star fruit leaf extract reduces the looks of lines and polyglutamic acid locks in moisture...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...Clinical Results:.Clinically proven to smooth texture & fine lines*+19% radiance observed**97% agreed it created a smooth canvas for makeup***+14% smoother skin after 1 application****24hr hydration****+17% smoother skin observed after 4 weeks***clinical assessment by dermatologist, 30 subjects, 4 weeks**self-assessment by scoring, 30 subjects, 4 weeks***self-assessment, 104 subjects, 4 weeks****instrumental test, 30 subjects...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Betaine, Polyglycerin-3, Nelumbo Nucifera Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Averrhoa Carambola Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sorbitol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Behenyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Silica, Sodium Pca, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Adenosine, Sodium Polyglutamate, Sodium Phytate, Propanediol, Caramel, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Citral <18907>						...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean skin twice a day, morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first, it works. Not going to try to say it doesn’t. Whenever it’s available as a sample or redeemable I’ll always choose it.  The scent though.. too much.  My eyes start watering from how strongly this is scented. I won’t purchase it because of that.

reviews.review_title: A solid choice for a moisturizer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This does make my skin feel good and hydrated! I’ve used to in the past as well but still l like to change it up by trying other brands! (Mainly because my routine comes and goes in waves) one thing I don’t love is that I can’t use it under my makeup without feeling like my makeup doesn’t stay out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: recieved this as a sample and my god did my face burn and sting , I instantly went red and looked like I was burnt ..... I don't have sensitive skin, but is this acid in this ?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only product line I keep repurchasing, in my 40s with dry skin and it works beautifully on my skin. I also love their night one that one is Amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Whatever they did to change this formula was the death of this product. Forget wearing  tinted moisturizer over this. It literally makes the makeup roll and flake off your skin. I have fantastic skin with minimal care needed. This is not it. Returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this product every day for several years until recently I bought this again and noticed that it wasn’t the same formulation. When I put it on my face it just sits there and feels very heavy to the point where it traps the heat from my skin and makes me sweat. I’m so disappointed with the new formula.

reviews.review_title: MY HOLY GRAIL MOISTURIZER IS NOW EATING MY FACE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for years. It’s done my skin  soooo good (until this recent jar). It was worth its weight in gold. Since the formula change it’s been eating my skin. It’s dry and flakey and it BURNS! It’s heavy and nothing like the original. DO NOT spend a dollar on this product. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burns and is very drying. I feel like this has actually made my skin worse and increased irritation and texture.

So disappointed in the formula change. Used this for several years as it was the only moisturizer that truly moisturized - the new formula no longer feels moisturizing. It now sits on top of the skin and does not soothe dry skin. I don't understand why a company would change a (previously) highly rated product. Customers don't want changes to existing products. It takes years to find products that work well. Customers just want consistency and reliability! Please change it back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this moisturizer for several years now. It moisturizes better than any drugstore lotion I've tried. But beyond that I have not noticed any additional benefits. Would gladly swap for a cheaper lotion of I could find one that works.

reviews.review_title: So Disappointing ...new formula leaves you dry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my daytime moisturizer for 5 years and I was just ready to buy a new one .But after seeing the 1 star reviews about a formula change I decided to get a sample of this new formula first and try it . Terrible changes , It makes my skin look tight and feel dry . It does the opposite of what the original formula did . And it makes me look older. I wish they would change this back. I am now on the hunt for a new moisturizer from a different brand for my VERY dry skin in NYC . Any suggestions ?

reviews.review_title: Used to be good, now an AWFUL product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TERRIBLE formula change. They even cheapened the jar of the moisturizer. Where it was once a glass lid, it is now a cheap plastic. Yet they raised the price of it to almost $80?! It used to be a luxurious application and a gel like consistency and it is now a heavy sunscreen type of cream that does not soak into your face. It just sits on the surface of your skin. It’s awful. Save your money and don’t buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moistrizer did nothing good for my skin, it is similar to cheap drug store moistrizers. Considering the expensive price, this was a total let-down and rip off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burned my skin! I wanted to try something different instead of spending tons of $$$ on products from a medi-spa so I did my research and tried this Fresh moisturizer as I like a lot of their other products… but this was such a bad purchase. I’ve been using it for a few weeks to give it a fair chance and no matter how/when I use it, it leaves a burning sensation. I had the worst reaction to it yet today as my face started to hurt, burn, itch, and turn red. My skin does not like these ingredients so I’m officially giving up on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so bummed - after almost a decade of this being my go to moisturizer, seems like there is a formula change and it is causing my skin to burn and feel dry and texture changing. I just realized there was a possible formula change and I need a minute to Morín.  there

reviews.review_title: Formula change is such a let down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed in the formula change :( I ordered a new jar and knew immediately after rubbing it on that something was off. It’s almost soapy and doesn’t seem to rub in like before. It leaves a bit of white residue too. I’ve been loyal to this moisturizer for so many years. My skin is not doing well and I’m worried I’ve developed a bit of an allergic reaction which is actually how I originally came to find this moisturizer. I am so saddened to have to now search for another moisturizer when my skin doesn’t do well with most creams. This used to feel luxurious and almost silky. Not anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for over 5 years. This new formula is a fail. It makes my skin burn and feels like I have used Vaseline. Disappointing that I have to start looking for alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in a kit I brought, and I loved it, and when i finished it up, i noticed the difference it made my skin look and feel. So I went and got another one...and i'm not giving it up, it is now a staple in my routine, it works wonders on my skin, and definitely smoothes and boosts radiance. Love It!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good for your skin I pare it with the overnight one so good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but it burns and irritates my ￼skin. I believe it’s because of the ￼￼fragrance and I don’t like the smell either. However I do like how it moisturize my skin but I couldn’t use it anymore because how bad it irritated my skin  will be returning ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After one week my fine lines are less noticeable. I’ve been using morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After years of loving this, they changed the formula. Instead of the usual light, easily absorbing gel-like texture, it’s now heavy, thick and sits on top of my skin like I just slapped on Vaseline. It absorb, and it leaves a white cast like a bad sunscreen. So so disappointed.   No and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my go-to moisturizer but they changed the formula and it's now a different product. It doesn't absorb as fast and leaves white streaks like cheap sunblock. I can't recommend it in it's current state.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to moisturizer for at least 10 years. The jar I just got is completely different. It creates a weird barrier that makes me sweat briefly in an odd way and leaves white streaks (they don’t last). It doesn’t feel as smooth and luxurious as it used to feel when applying. I used to actually like the mild cucumber-y scent but this new formula doesn’t seem to have that. I will be returning this. Have to start my search for a new facial moisturizer. Disappointing. First review I’ve ever written… wanted to make long-time users aware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure which ingredient in the product was the cause, but I had an allergic reaction to both this and the nighttime version of this same formula. I don't usually have sensitive skin and I have used this brand before without issue, so I was surprised. If you have sensitive skin, I would skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and I don’t think this product does a good job keeping me hydrated all day. It works for part of the day but I find myself having to reapply or feeling tight around 1pm. I also really don’t like the small

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this for a while, it's underwhelming. The fragrance is *strong* and reminds me of a cactus. Not exactly the first thing I wanted to smell in my morning routine. It's on the dense side but soaks in nicely and isn't terribly greasy. I find I just stopped reaching for it after about a week. I much prefer their Lotus Night Cream to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received it as a sample. Has a strong fragrance, and after a few seconds on my face got an immediate allergic reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite moisturizer. I am 55 years old and very picky.This is perfect and it makes my skin look flawless with foundation. I am very happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I never received the Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer, so I'm unable to leave an accurate review. However, as a fan of Fresh skincare, I can vouch for the quality of their products. The Fresh Rose Deep Hydration Emulsion is my all-time favorite moisturizer, delivering unparalleled hydration and nourishment to my skin. If the Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer by Fresh works similarly, it's undoubtedly worth trying. While I can't provide firsthand feedback on the Lotus Youth Preserve moisturizer based on my positive experiences with Fresh skincare, I would recommend giving it a chance. This was offered by freshbeauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this a few weeks, it’s a really nice moisturizer, doesn’t leave the skin feeling greasy but my skin is always feeling really hydrated after. Not the biggest fan of the smell but I like the product so much that I don’t really mind it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: purchased the mini size to try it and absolutely love it. Perfect for layering on top of serums and with oils. it's light but hydrating, doesn't pill and smells great. New daily fave (was previously using Tacha).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this new formula of the youth preserve moisturizer. This is my daily moisturizer and it’s made my face look so radiant and youthful. My fine lines, especially on my forehead is less visible now and the texture of my skin is noticeably smoother! This is a great buy for sure. Offered by freshbeauty

reviews.review_title: I tried it and it was all right
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by freshbeauty. I used this product with my other skincare products and at first, I didn’t really see any difference. Over the course of 2 weeks my skin felt more moisturized and glowy even after a long day at work surprisingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample. I did not like it. It was very sticky, even after a few hours my face was sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of this. It feels greasy and thick not like a day cream and after 1 minute it feels like granular pieces are on my face. Would not recommend. Much prefer tatcha or skinceuticals

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like it. It felt too tick and waxy on my face (I believe from glycerin as one of the main ingredients) and my skin broke out next day. I returned it.

reviews.review_title: Meh, not the best but I used the old formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product in November 2023 before it seemed the formula changed. I tried this at the recommendation of a Sephora employee while it was on a flash sale and it was just ok - a good medium weight, not a strong scent and made my skin look a bit plumper without making it look greasy (I have combo/acne prone skin). Unfortunately it made my skin sting a bit (and I don't typically have sensitive skin) and I still felt oily during the day so I returned it. It's just ok but I have found better moisturizers for a better price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected more from this cream. It’s disappointing that it’s so sticky that it feels heavy. It is even too sticky to wear as a night cream (which can be heavier). Too unpleasant to wear so I can’t see smoothing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face lotion is so hydrating! A little goes a long way! It truly transformed my face. I have oily and sensitive sink and this moisturizer looked amazing under my makeup. I used it morning and night and definitely noticed a different in my skin. Highly recommend for all skin types. This was a gifted by freshbeauty in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product from a sample i had chose, i love the thickness of this cream, leaving a very soothing feeling. But after 5 minutes, if i were to rub my face the cream would come off in little pieces? Is this normal?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin.  At first, I loved the light feeling of this moisturizer.  But I realized later in the day that it left a light oily residue on my face that I did not love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by freshbeauty. This product is so hydrating but without leaving your face oily. You can use this in cold weather but also warmer weather too. I have really oily skin and I’ve used this religiously for the past couple of weeks. Even traveling in an airplane doesn’t make your skin gross. RECOMMEND!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is good for hydrating the skin and providing a nice base for makeup or further skin care. It doesn’t feel greasy or heavy but definitely feels like the skin under is hydrated and healthy. This product was gifted by freshbeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this face cream! fresh really knocks it out of the park, this is a must have in any beauty routine. it’s gentle enough for sensitive skin to not cause irritation, but strong enough to make you look, well, fresh :) this was gifted by fresh but it’s all my own opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightly beautifully scented face cream that I enjoy using as it leaves my skin soft and smooth. It evens out the texture (I don't have major concerns besides dryness) and makes my makeup application easier.  Gifted by Fresh however the opinions are my very own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so great! Especially the scent of it, it is so pleasant! I highly recommend that you try the product, however, because I have an oily skin, I find that it works better for the night time rather than day!   *offered by freshbeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizer was gifted by fresh beauty. This lightweight moisturizer is perfect for my oily/acne prone skin. I wanted something that hydrated but also tackled fine lines and this has been perfect! It leaves my skin feeling smooth and I’ll continue to use to see the added benefits of targeting the fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by fresh beauty. However, I never received it. I reached out through the website I received it through and the company but unfortunately nothing has come from it. I have to write something though, or else three credits will forever be taken from my account (skeepers). I cannot give a review on a product I haven’t received 🙁

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh this moisturizer and I really liked it. I don’t see much change from the original version. To me it has the same feel, smell and texture to where I didn’t really notice a difference. I enjoy using this in the morning before my sunscreen. This helps to keep my skin hydrated during the day. I would def need more for the pm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh beauty. This is one of the best creams!! I have been using in the morning. I do apply it around 20 minutes before I apply my make up. I have dry skin so this moisturizer cream has helped give me for hydration. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received complimentary from Fresh Beauty Skincare. The lotus youth preserve face cream is my daily moisturizer in my skincare routine. I just love the glow it gives my skin especially during the colder, drier days and months. It perfect my skin for the application of my makeup and makes my skin looks soft and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this brand and this is my new favorite moisturizer. This wears amazing under my makeup and f k love the scent of it. Overall this is a great moisturizer for someone with dry combo skin. This was gifted by freshbeauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Has been a lovely addition to my morning routine. Has the same fresh scent as the soy cleanser, a subtle cucumber/green scent. Works well as a makeup cleanser and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Gifted by fresh beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another great moisturizer from Fresh! I have tried most of their new products in the last year & loved everything so far! This is a fantastic light weight everyday face cream & wore beautiful under makeup. Practically no scent, just a whisper of a faint refreshing smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh products are my go to and this did not disappoint. I love how creamy the texture was and felt it applied very lightweight. As for results, I did notice a smoother texture, but not any reduction in fine lines. Overall I was impressed.  gifted by fresh beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The day time cream of my dreams! This feels so luxurious keeping me moisturized all throughout the day. It preps perfectly for my makeup for the day and helps with my texture and fine-lines giving me that youthful radiant look. I love the whole line of fresh and highly recommend if you’re in the market for a new day time cream. Gifted by fresh beauty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite moisturizer! I love that it is non-greasy and I have been using this product morning and night on my face and neck. I truly believe this has saved my skin this winter. This product was gifted by freshbeauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin soaks this cream right up. Lightweight and non-sticky texture left behind. My skin looks smoother and more dewy after continuous use. This was gifted by freshbeauty in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by fresh beauty the lotus youth preserve moisturizer. I absolutely love this product! It is a thicker consistency but it leaves my skin feeling so moisturized! I would highly recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using products that have youth preservation elements to it. I think it is important to use products that prevent aging in the first place. I like this product because the moisturizer is thick, so I feel like it really sinks into my skin. Gifted by freshbeauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a couple of weeks now and I’ve really enjoyed it! I have acne prone skin and this hasn’t broken me out. It’s left my skin feeling really hydrated! If you’re looking for a great moisturizer I would recommend this one! Gifted by fresh beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh this moisturizer. Anything by Fresh is luxurious in their packaging down to the product itself. I have normal skin, but during the winter months my skin tends to be dry and this moisturizer is a cream. I like to use a little spatula to scoop out a small amount and it just glides on my skin. My skin immediately looks plump and more radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Lotus Preserve Moisturizer! I use it daily as a part of my morning skincare routine. I love how soft the cream is and makes my skin feel very smooth. This product was gifted by Fresh Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer and I am extremely impressed with the results. The lightweight formula is perfect for my combination skin and it left my face feeling hydrated and refreshed without any greasiness. The subtle lotus scent is also a nice touch. I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and appearance of my skin since using this moisturizer. I highly recommend giving it a try for a youthful and glowing complexion. This was gifted by Fresh Beauty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh. This moisturizer is really hydrating and has a lightweight texture. It has polyglutamic acid which my skin absolutely loves. I personally prefer to use it at night as the final step in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: ALL TIME FAVE ALL YEAR ROUND
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many moisturizers and none of them compare to this one! I have very dry and dull skin in the winter months and this is my morning moisturizer! It’s very lightweight but provides moisture, radiance, it smooths and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles! Absolutely recommend! Gifted by Fresh Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the light refreshing scent of this cream! It's a little heavier for a moisturizer which I usually stay away from but need in the winter with my oily combo skin. Only wish this came in a pump for easy and less messy application, but felt good on the skin. Gifted by freshbeauty in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Fresh Youth Preserve Moisturizer is a revelation in skincare. Its lightweight texture blends seamlessly into the skin, offering hydration without any greasy residue. Within days of use, my skin felt rejuvenated, with a noticeable decrease in fine lines and an improvement in overall skin texture. It was gifted by fresh but i am definitely buying it again.

reviews.review_title: So nice on my no-makeup days!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is such a good cream gifted to me by Fresh Beauty but unfortunately I can't wear it most days that I use foundation because it melts it off. It is a hydrating cream yet lightweight in consistency but I have combination skin and a very oily T-Zone and that's why I can't wear it under makeup. I love to use it on days when I don't wear anything on my face, when I feel like looking natural and I try to do often because it is so lovely. I feel it gives my skin a glass-like effect. Using this during the day and the recovery cream at night has helped my texture and my smiles lines are not as pronounced!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been in need of something to help hydrate my skin this winter. This stuff is going to be a new staple! Absolutely love how light yet hydrating it is. I received this product complimentary from Fresh for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this consistently for a few weeks now and am so incredibly impressed with the results and formulation! It visibly plumps and hydrates my skin over night and makes it feel so much smoother. Definitely my new holy grail! Offered by freshbeauty but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin feel ready to take on the day (and my makeup) It makes my skin look and feel radiant and glowy without looking oily. I highly recommend this moisturizer for anyone looking to step up their morning skincare routine. Gifted by Fresh Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be the perfect daytime moisturizer! It provides the moisture my skin needs without feeling heavy or greasy at all! I also love that it works so well under makeup which is always a plus for a day time moisturizer! It keeps my skin feel hydrated and soft all day! Gifted by freshbeauty

Overall my skin felt nicely hydrated and it wears well underneath makeup on my dry skin.  This product was gifted by Fresh in exchange for an honest review.

Fragrance: light, cucumber, doesn’t linger, Isn’t overpowering Texture: smooth and rich, but not heavy Application: does not feel heavy on the skin and moisturizes very well. Is not greasy or oily even as the day progresses. Results: skin feels plump and looks glowy and refreshed. Dry patches do not develop overnight or through the day. Layers well under makeup. reviews.review_text: While I can't compare it to the older version, my dry/mature skin is thoroughly enjoying the recently enhanced antioxidant formula. The moisturizer's light, fresh scent adds a delightful touch to my routine, making each application something to look forward to. Its lightweight texture absorbs seamlessly, leaving no heavy or sticky residue. Waking up to softer and well-hydrated skin has become a pleasant daily reality, and I'm particularly impressed with its ability to lock in moisture. Transitioning from their black tea moisturizer, I found this upgrade at the perfect time. The effectiveness of their moisturizers consistently aligns with my skincare needs. Highly recommended. Gifted by Fresh Beauty.

reviews.review_text: Personal Take on Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer  I recently introduced the Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer into my daily routine, and let me tell you – it's a game-changer.  Why I Love It:  Smooth Skin: My skin feels smoother, and those fine lines? Less noticeable. It's like a quick fix for tired skin. Radiance Boost: The radiance this gives my skin is unbelievable. I'm getting compliments on my glow – who doesn't love that? Hydration Magic: It keeps my skin hydrated all day. No need to reapply, even in the dry winter months. Makeup Ready: Perfect canvas for makeup. It's become my secret weapon for a flawless finish. Favorite Ingredients: The Super Lotus and star fruit leaf extract combo – it's like they were made for my skin. And the Vitamin E adds that extra touch of care.  Results Check: After four weeks, I see and feel the difference. My skin is thanking me, and I'm here for it.  How I Use It: Twice a day, every day. It's become a non-negotiable step in my routine – morning and night.  Bonus Tip: Pair it with the Lotus Dream Cream at night. It's like giving my skin a pampering session while I sleep.  In a nutshell, if you want a moisturizer that not only works but feels like a little luxury in your routine, Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer is worth every penny.  Gifted by Fresh Beauty.

reviews.review_text: gifted by Fresh, I am excited to share my recent experience with the latest iteration of Fresh's Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer, courtesy of Fresh. The moisturizer boasts a delightfully lightweight and silky texture, making it an ideal pick for those who favor a formula that's free from greasiness and won't clog pores. It applies effortlessly and absorbs rapidly, leaving no residue in its wake. This formula is fortified with lotus flower extract, a renowned ingredient for its hydrating and anti-aging benefits. Upon using this moisturizer, I observed an instant boost in my skin's hydration levels. It worked wonders in plumping my skin and diminishing the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles. Having used the Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer for several weeks now, I've noticed a significant transformation in my skin's overall appearance. It's more radiant, smoother, and youthful-looking. I'm also impressed by its ability to balance my skin tone and lessen the visibility of dark spots. If you're on the hunt for a product that will hydrate, nourish, and rejuvenate your skin, this moisturizer is absolutely worth considering.

reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for a new moisturizer that gives me a radiance glow for a while now so I’m happy . For the price , I think it’s worth it because a little goes a long way. I only use it in my morning skincare routine to give my makeup an extra glow look. Gifted by freshbeauty

reviews.review_text: This is the third Fresh moisturizer I've tried and again it has been great! Fresh does have other moisturizers that are heavier if you prefer that, but this one has been great for my oily skin!  gifted by freshbeauty

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer for a few days now and so far I’ve been enjoying it in my skin care routine. My skin has been on the dry side and this has been a great AM moisturizer for keeping my skin feeling moisturized throughout the day (although you can use it as both an AM and PM moisturizer). It didn’t have much of a scent which I really appreciate because my skin is also sensitive so I prefer little to no scent. Overall, I recommend giving it a try, especially if your skin in on the drier side/sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer is a gem in the realm of skincare. Enriched with the goodness of lotus flower extract, this lightweight, gel-like formula feels indulgent yet absorbs quickly, leaving a velvety-soft finish. Perfect for all skin types, it delivers a burst of hydration without any greasy residue. Beyond its refreshing texture, it's packed with antioxidants, delivering a powerhouse of protection against daily environmental stressors. The subtle, delightful scent adds to the luxurious experience. For those seeking a hydrating, protective, and radiant boost, this moisturizer is an exceptional choice. Gifted by Freshbeaity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this daily lightweight moisturizer! It not only provides a boost of hydration for my skin but also works wonders in smoothing out texture and reducing the appearance of fine lines. The upgraded antioxidant formula is a game-changer, leaving my skin supple, radiant, and perfectly prepped for makeup. I appreciate the ethically-sourced Super Lotus that protects against daily stressors, and the star fruit leaf extract works like magic on those pesky lines. Polyglutamic acid seals the deal by locking in moisture, making it an essential part of my skincare routine for youthful-looking skin. Highly recommend! Offered by freshbeauty

reviews.review_title: Eh- it’s okay, some things to cause concern
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by Fresh Beauty. This cream is lightweight and fast absorbing. It’s not greasy and I found that it didn’t clog my pores. With that said, there is citrus and lemon peel in the formula. It does sting upon contact if you have sensitive skin. I didn’t break out in hives, but I don’t like the fact that it stings when you put it on. I’d prefer one made for sensitive skin with no lemon peel or fragrance. It’s an ok moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this moisturizer is good. It hydrates my skin, has a very light, pleasant smell, and feels great on my skin. With that being said, it’s nothing special. This is just your run of the mill moisturizer, so if you’re in the market for that, then this might be the product for you. If you’re looking for a moisturizer with other properties like acne care, SPF, hyperpigmentation help,etc, look elsewhere. Being that I am only 20, the anti-aging properties of this moisturizer haven’t done much for my skin other than hydrate it.

reviews.review_text: I’ve used this cream before but wow this reformulation is great! It goes on lightweight and absorbs quickly but it’s a great makeup primer! It doesn’t pill and keeps my skin lightly hydrated while keeping my makeup from settling into my lines. Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_text: This moisturizer smells like fresh cucumbers and goodness. It’s very spa like, as soon as you open the container. The texture of this is very slick but upon application, it absorbs very quickly so you can apply enough for hydrating and not have to spend a long time applying the product, meaning it’s not too spreadable for the lightweight and slick consistency. After a few days of use, my skin was noticeably more smooth and less red. I have eczema and sensitive skin and I was worried at first because I thought it burnt a little bit. After the first few days that went away and my skin is now buttery soft after a couple weeks of using this. It’s SO good and I’m pleasantly surprised with how great this is!! I was gifted by fresh beauty and would absolutely purchase this once this runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh. The Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer is a newly upgraded formula to reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Key ingredients are Lotus plant extract to preserve the youthfulness of skin by smoothing lines and boosting radiance, star fruit leaf extract to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, polyglutamic acid to lock in moisture, and vitamin E to protect and soothe. My thoughts: although this claims to be a lightweight moisturizer, it feels heavy to me. It isn’t as heavy as the overnight version but it’s pretty thick for a daytime cream. If you have dry skin, you will love this! My face actually feels smoother and more moisturized and while it’s thick, I don’t feel any greasiness (my main concern with heavy moisturizers). This is perfect for me during the cold winter months.

What impresses me most is how the moisturizer feels on my skin. It absorbs beautifully without leaving any residue, making my skin feel nurtured and pampered. The subtle fragrance adds a touch of luxury to my daily skincare ritual.  Overall, the Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer, complimentary from FreshBeauty, stands out for its age-defying properties and delightful user experience. It's a must-try for anyone seeking a potent moisturizer that delivers lasting youthful results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, the lightweight and silky texture of the moisturizer make it a joy to apply. It effortlessly glides onto the skin, instantly providing a burst of moisture without any greasy or heavy residue. The subtle floral scent adds a touch of freshness, creating a pleasant and sensorial experience during application.  One of the key highlights of this moisturizer is its powerhouse ingredient, lotus flower extract. Known for its antioxidant properties, lotus extract helps combat free radicals and protect the skin from environmental stressors. Over time, I noticed an improvement in the overall radiance and vitality of my complexion, and my skin appeared more supple and revitalized.  The inclusion of peach leaf extract further enhances the moisturizer's ability to promote a youthful appearance. It aids in maintaining the skin's elasticity and reducing the appearance of fine lines, leaving my skin looking plump and hydrated.  I appreciate that Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It has proven to be gentle yet effective, making it a versatile choice for a wide range of individuals.  While the price point may be on the higher side, the quality of ingredients and the noticeable results justify the investment. A little goes a long way with this product, ensuring that the jar lasts for an extended period.  In conclusion, Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer has earned its place as a staple in my skincare routine. Its hydrating prowess, combined with the skin-renewing benefits of lotus flower extract, makes it a standout product for those seeking a luxurious and effective moisturizer to pamper their skin.
